294823.「おお よくぞ来てくれた <pc>！:
Oh, <pc>! How glad I am that you've
come!

294824.「そなたも バドリー岩石地帯の南で\n 突如 起きた異変を知って\n 訪ねてきて:
I assume you've come here due to the strange
happenings south of the Budley Rock Zone.

294825.「初めてお目にかかります グロスナー王。\n 私は <pc>の助手を務めている\:
It's my pleasure to make your acquaintance,
King Grossner. My name is Yuliza, and I'm
an assistant of <pc>'s.

294826.「今 バドリー岩石地帯の南は 大変危険です。\n 急ぎ 周辺を封鎖して 誰も近寄:
The area south of the Budley Rock Zone is extremely dangerous right now. Could you please seal off that area immediately? It's
in everyone's best interest if no one gets close.

294827.「うむ。案ずるには およばぬ。\n すでに あの地へ続く道は 厳重に封鎖し\n:
Very well. You have no need to worry. The road
leading there has already been sealed off, and
is currently guarded by Gartlant's soldiers.

294828.「何人たりとも わしの許可なく\n あそこに立ち入ることは できんだろう。:
No one is allowed to enter without my express
permission.

294829.「良かった……迅速な対応に 感謝します。:
What a relief...thank you for taking such
preemptive action.

294830.「だが 気がかりがある。そなたたちが来る前に\n アンルシア姫も 異変を察知し:
But something does worry me...before you two arrived, Princess Anlucia had already sensed that something was wrong, so she came here
and headed to that place together with our soldiers.

294832.「誰よりもウデの立つ 勇者姫だ。 \n それに 姫に同行させた兵は\n ガートラ:
She is a Hero princess with incredible skill.
Furthermore, the soldiers accompanying
her are of Gartlant's finest, but...

294833.「そろそろ戻ってきても いい頃合いなのに\n なんの音沙汰も ないのだ。:
They should've been back by now, but we've
yet to hear anything from them.

294834.「バドリー岩石地帯の南へは 城を出て\n ガートラント領を 西に進めば行けるから:
You can get to that place by heading west from
here to the Budley Rock Zone. I'd like you to
go there and assess the situation.

294835.「通路を封鎖している兵士には\n わしが許可を 伝令しておこう。\n この胸騒ぎ:
I'll send word to my soldiers there that you
have permission to pass. I hope that this
uneasiness is just needless worrying...

294836.「アンルシア姫が 心配です。\n 急いで バドリー岩石地帯の南へと\n 向かいま:
I'm worried about Anlucia, too. Let's hurry
to that area south of the Budley Rock Zone!

294837.「このヨロイは……ガートラントの兵士たちが\n 着ていたものと 同じですね。:
This armor...the soldiers of Gartlant wear
the same exact kind, don't they?

294838.「アンルシア姫と 封鎖地帯へ向かった\n ガートラント兵たちでしょうか。:
Could these be the soldiers that came along
with Princess Anlucia?

294839.「ここで いったい 何が……？\n この表情……まるで 一瞬で固まって\n しま:
What is going on here...? Their expression,
it's almost as if they were frozen in a split
second...

294840.「ジア・クト念晶体については わからないことが\n 多すぎます。今は 精一杯の警:
There's still so much we don't know about the
Dia Kut Telecrystal. All we can do for now is
continue on very cautiously...

294843.「また あの光が来てしまうわ！\n 岩陰に隠れて！:
That light is coming again! Hurry and hide
behind the rocks!

294845.「勇者の光が 効かない！？\n ああっ……！:
The Hero's Light doesn't work?!
Aaah...!

294848.「あの塔には 絶対に 近づかないでって……。: Stay far away from that tower...

294851.「また あの光が来る前に 逃げないと\n 姫の犠牲が 無駄になってしまう……。:
We have to get away from here before that
light shines again, or else the Princess's
sacrifice will have been for naught...

294853.「アンルシア姫の言っていた塔とは\n 以前 私たちが見た \n ジア・ルミナの船:
That tower she mentioned must be the same
Dia Kut ship we saw earlier.

294854.「確かに 地面に突き立った姿は\n 船と言うよりは まるで 巨大な塔……。:
Protruding from the ground like that really
does make it look more like a giant tower,
and not a ship...

294855.「結晶化した皆を こんな場所に\n 置いていきたくありません……。:
I don't want to leave everyone in this place
crystallized...

294856.「ですが 今はとても 手出しできない……。 \n この惨状を グロスナー王に\n:
However, there isn't much we can do right
now...and we have to report this to King
Grossner, anyways.

294857.「待っておったぞ <pc>！\n あの後 アンルシア姫を追って\n ルシェンダ殿:
We've been awaiting your return! After you
left, Lady Lushenda came here as well to
assist the Princess.

294858.「久しいな <pc>。\n だが……アンルシアは 一緒では ないのか？:
It's been some time, <pc>.
But...is Anlucia not with you?

294859.「バドリー岩石地帯へ向かったと 聞いたが……\n かの地で……何があった！？:
I was told you were headed to the Budley Rock
Zone...did something happen there?!

294860.<pc>は 塔からの謎の光を浴びて\nアンルシアや ガートラント兵たちが\n結晶:
<pc> explained that a mysterious
light from the tower crystallized Anlucia and
all of Gartlant's soldiers!

294861.「勇者のチカラでも なす術がないとは……。: Even the Hero's power could not stop it...

294862.「まず……これ以上 被害を広げぬためにも\n 対策が判明するまで 手出ししない方:
Most importantly...it would be wisest to stay
away from that place until we know how to
counteract it.

294863.「それで お前たちは その塔とやらが\n なんなのか 知っているのか？:
So, do you two know anything about what that
tower is?

294864.「塔を築いたのは ジア・クト念晶体……。\n かの異界滅神ジャゴヌバと 起源を同:
The tower was built by the Dia Kut
Telecrystal...a fearsome being that shares an
origin with Jagonuba.

294865.「異界滅神ジャゴヌバは ジア・クトの\n 一片だったわけですが……その同胞が\n:
The Otherworldly Obliterator was but a fragment of the Dia Kut...and now, his compatriots have finally found their way to
this world.

294866.「なんということだ……。\n あの脅威が 再び 襲いかかってくると\n いうのか:
Unbelievable...so that threat intends on
striking back once again, does it...?

294867.「ですが 希望はあります。\n 異界滅神ジャゴヌバを 打倒したのは\n ほかなら:
But there is hope. It was none other than
<pc> here that defeated Jagonuba.

294868.「<pc>と チカラを合わせ\n なんとしても 奴らへの\n 対抗手段を 見つけ:
Together, we will find a way to defeat them,
whatever it takes!

294869.「ふむ……。\n グロスナー王から 聞いてはいたが\n そなたは この事態にくわ:
Yes...King Grossner has already told me that
you're familiar with the situation.

294870.「こちらもすぐ グランゼドーラに戻って\n 対応を講じるが……アンルシアですら\:
I will return to Gran Zedora immediately to
make preparations...but even Anlucia was
no match against such a foe...

294871.「すぐに 手立てを見つけるのは\n 難しいだろう。:
Finding a quick solution to this will be quite
difficult.

294872.「お前たちのいう対抗手段 期待させてもらうぞ。\n 姫の件は <pc>が尽力して:
We'll be counting on whatever it is you're able to come up with. As for the Princess, I will let Arios know that the situation is in
your care and that we shall wait.

294873.「はい……必ずや 塔に対抗する手段を \n 見つけ 姫をお助けいたします。:
Of course...we will surely find a way to put a
stop to that tower and help the Princess.

294874.「アンルシアの命運は お前たちにかかっている。\n どうか あの子を助けてやって:
Anlucia's fate is in your hands. As the Hero's
Ally...please save her, <pc>.

294875.「ああ ふたりとも\n こちらへ来てもらって すまなかった。:
Oh, you two. Sorry I made you come all this
way.

294876.「ちょうど 英雄たちの 回復の具合を\n 確認していたところだったんでね。:
I was just checking on how the champions'
recovery was going.

294877.「まったく レオーネは 本当に\n 厄介な事をしてくれたよ。: Sheesh...Leone really caused quite the mess...

294878.「ジア・クトが本格的に 攻めてきた今こそ\n お前と フォステイルだけでも 神化:
Now that Dia Kut has launched an all-out offensive, now would be the perfect time for you and Fostail to undergo the deification
ritual, but that's unfortunately not possible right now.

294879.「悪神の火種を 投げ込まれたせいで\n 神化の儀に不可欠な 神化の光炉が\n ケ:
Due to the Fiend's Kindles being tossed inside
it, the Furnace of Deification has been
damaged, so we can't use it.

294880.「清めの大玉を使って 光炉を浄化しているが\n まだ 完全には ケガレを除去でき:
I've been using the Purifying Orb to try purifying it, but I haven't been able to completely scrub out all the damage. It'll
take some time before it's ready.

294881.「それで……やつらの船の調査は どうだった？:
So, then...how did the investigation of their
ship go?

294882.<pc>は 塔から出る謎の光によって\n人々が 結晶化してしまったことを 報告し:
<pc> explained that a mysterious
light that shone from the tower had caused
several people to become crystallized!

294883.「なるほど……。\n やはり ひと筋縄では いかないな。: I see...so it's not so easy after all.

294884.「はい……。塔の光は 浴びるだけで\n 全身が 結晶化してしまいます。\n いっ:
Yes...the tower's light will cause your entire
body to crystallize if exposed. How are we
supposed to act against that...?

294885.「あの光を前にした時の恐怖は 忘れられません。\n 圧倒的な脅威を前に なす術も:
The fear I felt when I saw that light is seared into my memory. The horror of being completely helpless in the face of such an
overwhelming threat...

294886.「だが……ジア・クトへの対抗手段については\n ひとつだけ 心当たりがある。:
But...I do have one idea of how we can strike
back at them.

294889.「私は ミトラーから頼まれて ここしばらく\n 我が旧友 ラダ・ガートを\n 復:
I've been searching for a way to resurrect our
old friend Lada Gart for some time now,
at Mitra's request.

294890.「やっと そちらに 目途がついたからね。\n ジア・クトとやらの脅威に 対抗する:
I've finally made some progress on that. Why
don't we work together to come up with a
way to fight Dia Kut back.

294891.「今 動ける英雄は お前達だけだ。\n チカラを合わせて 事に当たってくれ。\n:
You two are the only champions capable of
taking action, so please put your heads
together. As for a solution...

294892.「さあ これを受け取るがいい。\n 長年の間 秘匿されていた 天星郷の\n 禁忌:
Here, take this. It is the key to the most
forbidden secret the Firmament has ever
known, locked away for many years.

294893.<pc>は 天使長ミトラーから\n浄罪の宝石（だいじなもの）を 手渡された！ <:
<pc> received
the Purifying Jewel (Key Item) from Mitra!<me_60>

294894.「みそぎの時に行った 浄罪の泉に\n 女神ルティアナの像がある。\n その像のく:
There is a statue of Lutiana in the Spring of
Purity where you underwent purification. Place
the jewel in that statue's hollow.

294895.「その先に隠されたモノこそが \n ジア・クト攻略の糸口と なるはずだ。:
What is hidden below is the key to overcoming
Dia Kut.

294896.「浄罪の泉に そんな仕掛けがあったなんて\n 初めて 知りました……。:
I never knew there was such a device in the
Spring...

294897.「歴代の天使長にのみ 受け継がれる秘密だ。\n そんな禁忌を 明かすのだから\n:
It's a secret passed down only to successive
Archangels. Since I've revealed this secret
to you, just make it count, no matter what.

294898.「浄罪の泉は 確か 聖天区画の東だったね。\n あの泉の下に隠された 天星郷の禁:
The Spring of Purity is in the eastern part of the Holy Grounds, right? The Firmament's most forbidden secret... Let us see it with
our own eyes, shall we?

294899.「まさか ここに これほど大がかりな仕掛けが\n 隠されていたとは 驚きました。:
How surprising that such a large mechanism
was hidden here. Come on...let's go deeper.

294901.「天使長が 代替わりして ご挨拶に\n いらしたのかしら……と思ったのだけれど…:
I thought...maybe the Archangel would come
and say hello for once, but...it seems I was
mistaken...

294902.「うふふ……。\n ここに 天使長以外の方が来られたのは\n 何年振りの ことか:
Mmm hmm hmm...it's been many years since
anyone other than the Archangel has been
here...

294904.「私の名は テトラル……。\n 天使の故郷 とこしえのゆりかごの民の\n 最後の:
My name is Tetral...the last survivor of the
Eternal Cradle, homeland of the angels...

294905.「とこしえのゆりかご……？\n ですが 我らが とこしえのゆりかごから\n 旅立:
The Eternal Cradle...? But didn't the angels
leave that place a very long time ago...?

294906.「ええ そう……。\n 私は その時からずっと この身を蝕む\n 呪いの結晶と共:
Yes, that's correct...and ever since then, I
have lived with this crystalline curse that
consumes me...

294907.「結晶と共に生きる 唯一の存在……。\n それが知れれば おのずと ジア・クトの:
The only living being that's one with the
crystals...if this were to become known, then
so too would the threat of the Dia Kut.

294908.「それゆえ 代々の天使長たちは\n キミのことを ジア・クトと共に\n 禁忌とし:
So that's why the successive Archangels have
kept both you and the Dia Kut a secret as
forbidden knowledge...

294910.「ああ……ごめんなさい……。\n よく……意識が……飛んでしまうの……。:
Ohh... I am sorry...
I...often lose...consciousness....

294911.「結晶と 長く共存しすぎたせいで……\n 意識まで……侵食されているのかも……。:
Perhaps I've lived as one with the crystals
for too long, and...they've...eroded my...
consciousness...

294912.「キミはジア・クトの結晶に 侵されながら\n 生きている 唯一の存在だ。その理由:
You are the last alive who is still affected by their crystals. If we can understand the reason, then we might just have a means
to counter them.

294913.「どうして キミだけが 生き残れたか\n 何か 心当たりはあるのかな？:
Do you have any idea why you are the only
one who survived?

294914.「あの日は どこまでも 晴れた空が……\n 美しい日でした……。:
It was a beautiful day...with clear skies as
far as you could look...

294916.「ああ……ごめんなさい……。\n また 眠って……しまったみたい……。:
Ah, I'm sorry... I seemed to have...dozed
off again...

294917.「私は ルティアナ様の神殿に 仕える巫女で……\n とこしえのゆりかごが侵略され:
I am a maiden that serves in the temple of Lutiana...and even on the day the Cradle was invaded, I was performing a purification at
the spring...

294918.「とこしえのゆりかごにあった泉は\n ルティアナ様の神気を受けた 聖泉……。\n:
It was a sacred spring, imbued with the divine
power of Lutiana herself...before entering the
temple, we would purify ourselves there...

294919.「みそぎをしていたのは 私ひとりだった……。\n そこに あの呪いの光が 降りそ:
I was the only one undergoing purification
at that moment...and then...that cursed light
shone upon it...

294920.「皆が……次々と 結晶となる中で……\n 私だけが 生き残った……。:
While everyone else...was crystallized, one by
one... Only I managed to survive...

294921.「もう 何もかも忘れてしまったのに……\n あの日のことだけは 今も鮮明に\n:
I've forgotten everything... Except that day,
which I can vividly recall...

294922.「ルティアナの神気をたたえた水か……。\n おそらく それが カギなんだろうね。:
Water imbued with Lutiana's divine power...
Perhaps that's the key to all this.

294923.「彼女は 全身 泉の水でぬれていた。\n それが ジア・クトの光線で結晶化するの:
Her body was most likely soaked with water
from the spring. That must be why the light
didn't fully crystallize her.

294924.「ルティアナ様の神気を たたえた水なら \n 今 通ってきた浄罪の泉にもあります:
If it's that divine water, then the same water
exists in the Spring of Purity above us. So
if we used that water, then...?

294925.「試してみる価値は あるだろうね。\n 浄罪の泉の水を 調べてみるとしよう。:
It's certainly worth a try, right? Let's get a
closer look at that water.

294926.「テトラル様……。\n つらい記憶を お話ししてくださって\n ありがとうござい:
Ms. Tetral... Thank you for sharing your
painful memories with us.

294927.「気が遠くなるほどの長い間 転生することもなく\n ただひとり 生き続けることは:
Living alone for so long without the
possibility of reincarnation...what an
unimaginably harsh fate that must be.

294928.「ですが テトラル様がいてくれたおかげで\n ジア・クトに 対抗する方法が\n:
But thanks to you, we may have found a way
to strike back at the Dia Kut.

294930.「ごめんなさい……私の 気のせいね……。 \n ジア・クトに挑んだ者は 皆 死ん:
I am sorry... I was just imagining things...
Those who have challenged the Dia Kut
have all met death... Please, be careful...

294933.「神化の儀の前に みそぎをした時から\n 感じていたんだが……やはり 泉の水から:
I've sensed it since the purification before
the deification ritual...there is definitely
some kind of divine energy in this water.

294934.「ふふっ 女神には 会ったことがないから\n 特定することは できないが……おそ:
Heh heh...I haven't personally met the
Goddess, so I can't say for sure...but this
is probably her divine energy.

294935.「だとしたら テトラル様と同じように\n この泉の水を浴びておけば 塔の光を浴び:
So if we bathed ourselves in this water just
as Tetral did, then we could prevent the
tower's light from crystallizing us?

294937.「ですが 同じ浄罪の水では……？: But it is the same water, isn't it...?

294938.「彼女は その身のほとんどが 結晶化していた。\n 泉の水を浴びただけでは ジア:
Most of her body was still crystallized.
It seems then that just the water wouldn't be
enough going up against the Dia Kut.

294939.「そんな……何か 手立ては……。: I see...there has to be another way...

294940.「<pc>。このツボに泉の水を\n くんでくれないか。:
<pc>. Could you fill this pot
with some of the water?

294941.浄罪の泉の水を ツボにくみますか？<yesno><close>:
Fill the pot with water from the Spring of
Purity?<yesno><close>

294942.「ふふっ 私は こういったチカラ仕事は\n あまり 得意じゃないからね。\n 君:
I'm not really cut out for this kind of manual
labor, so...I'll have to leave this to you.

294944.<pc>は \n浄罪の泉の水（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me_60>:
<pc> received
Spring of Purity Water (Key Item)!<me_60>

294945.「ありがとう 助かったよ。\n これだけ泉の水があれば 実験するには\n 十分だ:
Thank you for your help. With this much water,
it should be enough for some experimenting.

294946.「これを持って フォーリオン外郭の\n 薬師の家にいる サワディエルに\n 会い:
Take that pot and go see Sawadiel. He's in
the doctor's house in Outer Fourion.

294947.「彼には ラダ・ガートの魂を復元する手立てを\n 探っている時にも 協力してもら:
He also helped me in searching for a way to
restore Lada Gart's soul.

294948.「彼は 私に借りがあるからね。\n 今回も喜んで チカラを貸してくれるだろうさ。:
He owes me a favor, you see. I'm sure he'll
be more than happy to lend a helping hand
once more.

294949.「おおっ！ 本当か？\n あの水から 神気だけを抽出するのは\n 相当 難しい芸:
Ohh! Is that true? It must be quite the feat
to extract only the divine energy from that
water, yes?

294950.「はい。\n <pc>の弟が 錬金術を使って\n 見事 やりとげてくれました。:
That's right. <pc>'s brother used
alchemy and did a fantastic job.

294951.「はい。\n <pc>の兄が 錬金術を使って\n 見事 やりとげてくれました。:
That's right. <pc>'s brother used
alchemy and did a fantastic job.

294952.「はい。\n <pc>の妹が 錬金術を使って\n 見事 やりとげてくれました。:
That's right. <pc>'s sister used
alchemy and did a fantastic job.

294953.「はい。\n <pc>の姉が 錬金術を使って\n 見事 やりとげてくれました。:
That's right. <pc>'s sister used
alchemy and did a fantastic job.

294954.「やあ 皆 お揃いのようだね。\n 結晶の準備が 整ったようなので\n 私も お:
Hello. Looks like we're all on the same page
now. Since the preparations for the crystal
are ready, I'll join in too.

294955.「それじゃあ <pc>。\n 神気の結晶を サワディエルに\n 渡してくれないか:

295101.「久しぶりだな！ <cs_pchero>！\n 俺も仲間に 入れてくれよ！:
Been a while, hasn't it? Count me in as one
of your companions, yeah?!

295102.「アシュレイ……。\n お前は 動けないはずでは……。: Ashley...you shouldn't be able to move...

295103.「よう レオ！\n しばらく見ない間に\n ずいぶん はっちゃけたなぁ！:
Heya, Leo! Looks like you've really let
yourself go while I was gone!

295104.「兄貴としては グレちまったお前を \n 放っておけなくてな。\n ちょいと無理:
As your brother, I couldn't just leave you to
keep digging yourself deeper. Had to push
myself a bit to come to your rescue.

295105.「レオーネ。\n お前が始末しろ。あの 小うるさい虫は。: Leone. Take care of it. That annoying insect.

295106.「ああ……望むところだ。\n 兄貴といえど 容赦はしない。:
Yeah...I'd expect nothing less. Even though
you're my brother, I'm still not going to go
easy on you.

295107.「ため込むのは お前の悪いクセだぜ レオ。\n 全力で 受け止めてやるから 本気:
Holdin' back is a bad habit of yours, Leo.
I'll take everything you throw at me, so
come on, get serious!

295109.「前回は お前の実力を 侮っていた。\n 今度こそ 全力で駆除しよう。:
We underestimated your ability last time.
This time, we will not hold back in
eliminating you.

295110.「ンフフフフ……<heart>\n 見せてみろ！ お前のチカラを！:
Mmm hmm hmm hmm...<heart>
Your power! Show it to us!

295112.「完全なる ジア・クト念晶体に\n 敗北など ありえぬ……。:
The perfect...Dia Kut Telecrystal defeated...
Inconceivable...!

295113.「完全な生き物など 存在しない！\n あなたは 負けたんです！:
There's no such thing as a perfect being!
You've lost!

295114.「敗れたというのか……？\n 完全な種族のはずの ジア・クトが……。: Defeated...? Dia Kut, a perfect species...?

295115.「勝利以外 許されん！\n ジア・クト念晶体には！:
Naught but victory is acceptable!
For the Dia Kut Telecrystal!

295116.「やはり 人類に福音など 存在しないのか……。:
I suppose there really is no salvation for
humanity after all...

295117.「援護しろ。レオーネ！\n すぐに治る！ この程度の傷など！:
Cover me. Leone!
We will soon heal! These wounds are nothing!

295119.「俺に……命令するな……。\n 不完全な まがい物風情が……！:
Don't...order me around...
You imperfect imitation...!

295120.「やっと 信じられると思ったのに……\n お前達も 俺の期待を 裏切るのか！！:
Just when I thought I could finally trust
you...you fail my expectations as well?!

295122.「お前は 所詮……私から切り出された\n 末端のひとかけらを 得たにすぎんッ……:
You are...just a piece of me that I cast
aside...a mere fragment!

295123.「許されるものか！ お前ごとき小片が\n 偉大なる原石たる私に 逆らうなど……！:
Unforgivable!! A mere fragment like you...
Defying me...a brilliant Primestone...!

295124.「砕け散れ！！\n そして 俺の前から 永遠に消えろ！: Shatter, and begone from my sight forever!!

295128.「くだらん……人類も……ジア・クトも……。\n すべて 等しく不完全で……不要な:
Humanity... Dia Kut... what nonsense... All
just equally imperfect...and unnecessary!!

295129.「俺は……生まれてくるべきではなかった！\n 利用され おとしめられ……苦しむだ:
I...I should have never been born!! A life of
being used, scorned...such a life of suffering
is better off not existing at all...

295130.「不完全な存在が 罪深き生を\n 貪るのを この手で止めるのだ！:
With these hands, I will stop the sinful lives
that imperfect beings like you consume without
end!

295140.「遅いっ！\n 突っ込むと決めたなら 死ぬ気で来い！:
Too slow! When you decide to charge in, you
have to be ready to die!

295142.「……だけど こっちが本命ですよっ！\n はあああああっ！:
...but I'm not gonna hold back this time!
Haaaaaaaah!

295148.「敵は 大魔王なのだ！\n そんな体たらくで キズひとつ つけられるか！:
Your enemy is the Demon Lord! You won't
be able to lay a finger on them if you keep
that up!

295151.「先生は ぼくを 鍛えようとしているだけです。\n ぼくが 弱いから……:
He's only trying to train me. Because I'm too
weak...

295152.「……剣から呪文への連携は 悪くなかった。\n 勇者として お前は どちらも使え:
Your combination of sword and spell wasn't too bad. As a Hero, you're able to use both. If you can utilize that effectively, you may
improve a bit.

295154.「そろそろ 休憩にするぞ。: I think it's about time for a break.

295155.「いい風だな……もうすぐ 夏か。: What a nice breeze...it's almost summer, huh?

295156.「あの……先生。\n ずっと 気になっていたんですが……:
Umm...Mr. Leone. There's something I've been
wondering about for a while...

295157.「先生のその羽根飾りは 特別なモノなのですか？\n どんな時も 身につけています:
Is that feather adornment something special
to you? I never see you without it.

295159.「ずっと 昔に……約束をしたんだ。\n 何があっても…………\n この羽根を 共:
A long time ago...I made a promise.
A promise that we would wear these
feathers together...no matter what.

295160.「そうですか……。\n その方は 先生にとって\n とても 大切な人なのですね。:
I see...so that person must be pretty
important to you, then.

295161.「さあ どうだろうな？\n お前に言われて 久しぶりに思いだした。\n 気が遠く:
Well, who knows? You've reminded me of
something I haven't thought about in ages...
It's crazy how long ago that was.

295162.「俺は全身全霊で アジールを鍛え\n 勇者へと 育て上げた。:
I trained Azir with all my heart and soul,
raising him to become a Hero.

295163.「生きがいを得たことで 俺は立ち直り……\n 新しい自分の人生を 受け入れられた:
Having purpose helped me to stand back up
again...I could accept this new life. Those
days of training...they were enjoyable.

295164.「だが……やっと 手に入れた拠り所すら……\n すぐに……失われてしまったんだ…:
However...even the foundation I managed to
create...crumbled in an instant...

295165.勇者アジールと 盟友レオーネの\n幻影が消え 閉ざされていた道が\n通れるように:
Azir and Leone's phantoms disappear...
and the way forward reveals itself!

295167.「先生……見てくれましたか……？\n 今度は ちゃんとできましたよ……。:
Did...did you see it...? I did it right this
time...

295169.「お前が 大魔王ヴァルザードを倒したんだ。: You defeated Valzard, the Demon Lord.

295170.「本当に よくやった。\n 勇者アジールよ！:
You've truly done well.
Azir, the Hero!

295172.「先生の おかげです……。\n 頼りになる盟友が ずっとそばに\n いてくれたか:
It's all thanks to you...you've been a
reliable Ally by my side this whole time...

295173.「キズにさわるから もう しゃべらなくていい。\n さあ 共に帰ろう……。:
Don't say another word, you'll just hurt
yourself. Come on, let's go home...

295178.「お前がいたから……俺は もう一度\n 生きてみようと 思えたのに……。:
Because of you, I...I felt like I had purpose
in living again...

295182.「勇者ひとりを救えず 無様に生き残るなんて……\n 何が 盟友だ……。:
Surviving so shamelessly, not being able to
save even a single Hero... What kind of Ally
is that...?

295183.「まったく……皮肉なものだな。\n 勇者を守るための 盟友だったはずなのに\n:
Well...it's ironic, isn't it? I was supposed
to be an Ally protecting the Hero, only to
lose him and survive myself.

295184.「国に戻った俺は アジールの母\n ゼーナピアに アジール殺害の罪を着せられ\n:
When I returned, Azir's mother Zenapia framed
me for his murder, and had me executed without
letting me defend myself.

295185.「ゼーナピアにとって アジールの存在は\n あまりに大きく……俺を憎むことでしか:
Azir's existence meant too much to her...
and the only way she could fill that void
was by despising me.

295186.「アジールを 大切に思っていた気持ちは\n 俺も 同じだったというのに……。:
I cared for Azir just as much as he cared for
me...

295187.「お前は 俺の大事な弟だ。\n それは永遠に 変わることはない。:
You are my precious brother. That's something
that'll never change.

295188.「だが お前は 世界に仇なす道を選んだ。\n 何度も 引き返す機会はあったはずな:
But you chose revenge on the world... You had
so many chances to just turn around, but...
you made your decision.

295189.「俺は 勇者だ。\n どんなことがあっても 人々を守り\n 人々のために戦うと:
I am a Hero. I've chosen to protect and fight
for everyone's sake, no matter what.

295190.「俺は 勇者として お前を倒す！: And as a Hero...I will defeat you!

295192.「あいつは ずっと\n 盟友である お前のことを気にかけていた。:
He's always cared about you, his
greatest Ally...

295193.「この羽根飾りは あいつの形見だ。\n よければ お前が持っていてやってくれ。:
This feather adornment was a memento of his.
If you'd like, you can keep it.

295196.「はあーーーー……。\n ぺちゃんこになっちまう前に アンタを\n 受け止められ:
Hoooo.... Good thing I caught you before
you became flat as a pancake...

295199.「俺たち全員 ボロボロだな。\n まったく……とっさに翼を出すチカラも\n 残っ:
We're all pretty beat up, yeah? Man...didn't
even have enough strength to sprout wings
on the spot...

295201.「まさか……ジア・ルミナの言っていた\n ジア・クトの本隊が\n もう 到着して:
Don't tell me...the main force that Dia
Lumina mentioned...they're already here...?

295202.「おい！ すげえ数だぞ！\n こりゃさすがに ヤベェんじゃねえか！？:
Hey! There's way too many! What the heck are
we supposed to do?!

295203.「でも やるしか ありませんっ……！\n 私たちが退いたら アストルティアの\n:
But we have to do something...! If we don't,
then everyone in Astoltia will...

295205.「間に合ってよかった……！: I'm glad I made in time...!

295206.「もう大丈夫だよ みんな。\n ここからは ボクたちに任せて。:
It's gonna be okay, you guys. We'll handle
things from here.

295207.「おりゃあああーーーーーっ！\n どけどけどけーーっ！\n 英雄様の お通りじゃ:
Raaaaaghhh! Move it, move it, move it!
The great champion, comin' throooough!

295208.「わたくしも 負けていられません。: I cannot afford to lose, either.

295210.「ハクオウ！\n そなたは 左翼を頼む！: Hakuo! I leave the left flank to you!

295212.「すごい……英雄たちのおかげで\n 敵が押し返されていきます！:
Amazing...the champions are pushing them
back!

295213.「へへっ！ 待ってたぜぇ お前ら！\n 寝てばっかりで 退屈だったろうし\n 思:
Heh heh! Been waitin' for you guys! I know
you've been bored senseless sleeping for
so long! Go wild, you've earned it!

295214.「さ……さすがに 敵の数が多すぎるよ！\n なんとかして 裂け目を ふさがないと:
T...there's just too many of them! We need to
find some way to close this rift...

295215.「んなこといったって どーすんだよ！\n 最後の１匹になるまで 倒すしかねーだろ:
Well, what else can we do? We just gotta keep
beating 'em down until there's only one left!

295216.<center>頼みが……あるんだ……。\n羽根飾りを 空に 掲げてくれ……。:
I have...just one favor to ask... Please...
Raise that feather adornment high...

295218.「強くて やさしい光……。: What a strong, yet gentle light...

295219.「この光が 敵を止めてくれている間に\n 一気に 押し返すぞ！:
While that light stops them, we'll push them
back in a single strike!

295221.「アストルティアは\n ボク達英雄が 守るんだっ！: Astoltia is what us champions will protect!

295222.「あなたたちの好きには させませんっ！: We won't let you have your way!

295223.「光で 裂け目がふさがっていく……！: The light is closing the rift...!

295225.「ハッハーーーン！\n アタシたちに かかれば\n こんなん 楽勝だっての！:
Hahaaaaaaaa! So long as we're here, it's a
piece of cake!

295226.「敵が多すぎて ちょっと ヒヤっとしたけどよ！\n <cs_pchero>のおか:
There were so many of 'em, I was getting kinda
scared! But <cs_pchero> saved the
day!

295228.「……ありがとう レオ。\n 結局 最後には助けてくれるなんて\n お前らしいよ:
Thanks, Leo... It's just like you to come to
lend a hand in the very end.

295229.「……今は そっとしておきましょう。: We should leave him be for now...

295230.「塔の主である ジア・ルミナを倒したおかげか\n 結晶化していた人々も 元に 戻:
In defeating Dia Lumina, it seems those who
were crystallized have turned back to normal.

295231.「天使長が 報告を待っているはずです。\n 戦いで受けた傷を いやす必要もありま:
The Archangel will be waiting for our report.
We also need to let our wounds heal, so let's
head back to the Firmament.

295234.「騒がしいぞ。\n また 奴らの船が 降り立ったのか？\n それとも 敵の軍勢が:
So noisy. Did any more of their ships land?
Or is their army rushing in again?

295235.「こ 今回は もっとヤバそうなんでさぁ！\n とにかく き 来てくだせえ！:
T...this time it's even worse!! C...come an'
see!!

295935.「そのくらいにしろ レオーネ。\n 私が 止めなければ\n アジールは 深手を負:
That's quite enough, Leone. If I hadn't
stepped in, Azir would've gotten seriously
hurt.

295944.「そんな……あの姿……。\n まるで ジア・ルミナのよう……。:
No...that shape...it's just like Dia
Lumina's...

295946.「我こそが 人類にとっての福音……\n 勇者と ジア・クトのチカラを手に入れ\n:
We are the salvation of humanity...who bears
the power of both Hero and Dia Kut, and will
return all to nothingness!

295948.「確かに人間は 間違いを犯すかもしれない！\n でも それでいいじゃねえか！\n:
Of course, humans make mistakes! But that's
okay! If you make a mistake, just start over
and try again!

295949.「アシュレイ……いつも お前はそうだった。\n 当然のように 選ばれし者の王道を:
You've always been that way, Ashley... Naturally following the chosen one's path, not even realizing you were chosen in the first
place.

295950.「その陰で 選ばれなかった者たちが\n どんな気持ちで いたのかなど \n 考え:
Have you ever thought about the feelings of
those who were not chosen, I wonder...

295951.「俺は いつだって お前とは\n 対等だと思っていた。 \n お前は そうじゃな:
I always thought of us as equals. But...
you didn't, did you...?

295952.「まさに 生まれながらの強者……。\n お前こそ 勇者に ふさわしい。:
Indeed, you were born strong...
You are truly worthy of being called a Hero.

295953.「お前のそういうところが 大嫌いだったよ！\n 死ね！ アシュレイッ！！:
I always HATED that about you!!
DIE, ASHLEY!!

295956.「貴様のような 存在がいるから\n 勇者などという おごった者が 増長するのだ！:
It's because of whelps like you that these
arrogant, so-called HEROES become so
FULL of themselves!!

295957.「盟友という立場に甘んじ\n 日の当たらぬ道を歩む 愚か者が！！:
A fool who settles as being an Ally and
is nothing but a mere shadow!

295958.「いいだろう……！\n 貴様も 勇者と共に死ぬがいい！！:
Very well...! You and your precious Hero
can die together!!

295961.「天使の光輪よ！ 我が声に応え\n ここに 顕現せよ！:
O angelic halo! Answer my call, and reveal
yourself to me here!

295962.<center>今こそ チカラを貸しましょう！\n私の創りだせし 光輪の上を\n:
The time has come to lend you my power!
Let the halo I've created be your battlefield!

295964.「私が光輪を維持しますから その間に\n レオーネを 倒すのです！:
I will maintain this halo! You must defeat
Leone!

295965.「勇者と盟友の 忌まわしい歴史を\n 今こそ 終わらせてやる！:
The abominable history of the Hero and
Ally ends here!

295968.「ずっと小さな頃から 兄貴は\n 誰よりも 勇者だった……。:
Ever since I was little, you were more of
a Hero than anyone else...

295969.「お前は そのままでいろよ……。\n 勇者アシュレイ……。:
Keep being yourself...
Ashley, the Hero...

296517.「あのデカブツが……\n ジア・クトの本丸……なのか？:
That gigantic thing...is that Dia Kut's
main stronghold...?

296528.「余興は 楽しんでいただけたかな？\n ゆりかごの末裔たちよ。:
Did you enjoy your entertainment?
...Descendants of the Cradle.

296529.「余は ジア・レド・ゲノス。\n ジア・クト念晶体を統べる 万象の王。:
I am Dia Ledo Genos. The ruler of the Dia Kut
Telecrystal who governs all.

296531.「そなたらと 戯れたのは\n ジア・クト全軍の ほんの ひとかけら……。:
You've played with a mere fraction of Dia
Kut's entire army...

296532.「あれほどの 大軍勢が……\n ほんの 一部でしかないだと……？:
So that large army...is only a fraction of
what could have come here...?

296533.「見よ！ この美しき 魔眼の月を！\n これこそが アストルティアの終焉を照らす:
Behold! The beautiful Eye of Evil!
The symbol of absolute domination that
spells the end of Astoltia!

296534.「侵略は 我らの本能。\n 支配とは 我らのたしなみ。:
Aggression is our instinct.
Domination is our calling.

296535.「空を見上げるたび 思いだすがいい！\n そなたらが ジア・クトにとって\n 征:
Every time you gaze to the skies, remember
well! Remember that you are powerless in
the face of Dia Kut, your conquerors!

296536.「滅浄の刻が 満ちし折……アストルティアの地は\n 新たな姿へと 生まれ変わるだ:
When the moment of cleansing arrives...
Astoltia shall be reborn anew! Tremble in
anticipation until that time comes...

296537.「我ら天使の故郷 とこしえのゆりかごが\n 滅んだ時も 突如として 空に禍々しい:
It's said that when the Eternal Cradle was
destroyed, a moon suddenly rose into the
sky...

296538.「ふん……我々は 今まさに 故郷と同じ危機に\n 瀕していると いうわけだ。:
Heh... Looks like we're facing the same crisis
that our homeland once did.

296539.「だが そう何度も ジア・クトに\n 侵略を許すつもりは 断じてない！:
But I absolutely will not allow Dia Kut to
have its way again!

296540.「奴らと 決戦の時も近い……。: Our final battle with them draws closer...

296541.「お前たち英雄は 今や ジア・クトの大軍勢を\n 退けるほどに 強くなっている。:
You champions have grown strong enough to hold
back Dia Kut's massive army.

296542.「これからの戦いの中心と なってもらうぞ。\n もちろん 我ら天使も 総力を挙げ:
You'll all be in the forefront of this coming
battle. And of course, us angels will also
give it our all.

296543.「さあ お前たちも 配置に戻れ。: Okay, everyone! Back to your posts!

296544.「塔での戦いの後 あわただしくて\n お話しする機会が ありませんでしたが\n:
Things got so hectic after the battle at the
tower, so we really haven't had a chance to
talk, but...you noticed my halo, didn't you?

296545.「導きの天使には 英雄に足る人物を見極めるため\n 地上で活躍している 英雄の卵:
Angels of Guidance are tasked with identifying
would-be champions down on the surface, to
see who is worthy of becoming one.

296546.「導きの天使として 新米である私が\n 最初に見出した 英雄の卵が あなたでした:
As an Angel of Guidance myself, you were the
first one I discovered when I was still new.

296547.「私は この天星郷から\n あなたと あなたの戦いを\n ずっと 見守ってきた…:
I have been watching you and your battles
all the way from up here...

296548.「そうして 見守っているうち\n 人のために心を砕く あなたの優しさに\n いつ:
As I watched over you, I found myself drawn to
your kindness and your willingness to put
others before yourself.

296549.「その想いは あなたが 冥王ネルゲルとの戦いで\n 窮地に陥った時 天使の禁を破:
It was those feelings that convinced me to break the angelic law, and intervene during the tight spot you found yourself in against
Nergel.

296550.「地上の戦いに 天使が介入することは大罪です。\n 以来 私は 罪付きの天使と呼:
It is a serious crime for angels to interfere with conflicts in the lower world. Since then, I've been called a sinful angel, and for a
while was even stripped of my position as an Angel of Guidance.

296551.「ですが 後悔は していません。\n ずっと あなたのチカラになりたいと\n 思:
But I have no regrets. I have always wanted to
help you in any way I could...

296552.「……やっと 言えてよかった。\n 初めて ロンダ岬で 会った時から\n ずっと:
I'm glad I was finally able to tell you...
It's what I've wanted ever since I first met
you back at the Rhonda Cape.
